summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to retitling employee positions in the various City departments, fixing compensation and providing payment therefor, retitling employee positions in certain departments as a result of the ongoing City-wide Classification Project, retitling employee positions listed in the 1982 Budget of Ordinance 110263, establishing positions inadvertently omitted from the 1982 Budget Ordinance 110263, and fixing salaries, rates and titles for certain employee positions as recommended by the Personnel Director.
